channel.title: Comments on: Eve Watches All the Escape Room Horror Movies So You Don’t Have To
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: In & Out Like a Lion – Eve Taft

item.description: […] of course, I yelled about horror. Here’s this month’s Quaint and Curious Volumes, where I rank all of those escape room themed movies […]
